topic.title: Global Assessment Of Functioning - conformance rules

section.p: Axis 5 permits the clinician to indicate his/her overall judgment of a person's psychological, social and occupation functioning on a scale, the Global Assessment of Functioning (GAF Scale).

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] value with data type Code
The code indicating the clinician's overall judgment of a person's psychological, social and occupation functioning on the Global Assessment of Functioning (GAF Scale).

Contains exactly one [1..1] value with data type Code
The code indicating the clinician's overall judgment of a person's psychological, social and occupation functioning on the Global Assessment of Functioning (GAF Scale).
